evidence: The Hotelling Observer is designed to be the best possible linear observer.
we take the image data and apply a linear template to it.
We might only use selected features or specific channels of the image, instead of the full dataset. That gives us the Channelized Hotelling Observer
The Hotelling Observer is designed to be the best possible linear observer. What does “best” mean here? It means the observer chooses its template in a way that maximizes the signal-to-noise ratio.
A linear observer applies a linear template to an image data vector to obtain the value of a scalar test statistic t.
